ideas.name: 1:1 Meetup Program
ideas.description: Structured one-hour paired meetings between community members to foster genuine connection and two-way discovery.

ideas.name: Network Social Club
ideas.description: A platform where participants can vouch for each other with labels to help members learn who's who and find commonalities in the community.

ideas.name: Intramural Sports Community
ideas.description: Building a community where exercise, healthy food, and play are integrated into daily life with organized leagues for basketball, beach volleyball, and beach soccer.

ideas.name: Hard Skills Class
ideas.description: First-principles class teaching practical skills like woodworking, cooking, and building using hands-on projects.

ideas.name: Workshop on Creating New Societies and Communities
ideas.description: Educational workshop on founding and designing resilient new communities and startup-societies with shared purpose and philosophy.

ideas.name: Regen Network State
ideas.description: A network of resource-resilient and intentional lifestyle community land developments collaborating globally, with first location in Bali, Indonesia.

ideas.name: Café Apartment Concept for NS
ideas.description: Transform a multi-story building into creative spaces with cafés, boutiques, and community areas inspired by Ho Chi Minh City's Café Apartment model.

ideas.name: Post-AGI Human Meaning Problem
ideas.description: Research and discussion initiative addressing how humans can find meaning and purpose in a post-AGI world, exploring decentralized AI governance alternatives.

ideas.name: Half Baked Pitching Event
ideas.description: A training event for improving pitching, storytelling, and idea-sharing skills with no prerequisites required.

ideas.name: Longevity Series at NS
ideas.description: Lecture and discussion series on aging, radical longevity, and the future of health with expert deep dives and open Q&A debates.

apps.name: NSPals
apps.description: Community matching platform that helps NS members connect based on profiles and interests with discovery features.

apps.name: NS Robotics Club - Clippy
apps.description: Robotic arms built by NS Robotics Club with plans for workshop and triple production within the cohort.

apps.name: Insurus
apps.description: Home-safety Protect2Earn platform with AI photo verification, VeChain blockchain integration, and rewards system for monthly property safety checks.

apps.name: Slouch Sniper
apps.description: Posture detection app that helps users maintain proper sitting posture with trainable ML model and gamification features.

apps.name: Daily Luma Event Auto-posting Bot
apps.description: Discord bot that automatically posts daily NS events from Luma with proper timezone handling.

apps.name: NS Bounty Board
apps.description: Lightweight task marketplace for NS members to post incentivized jobs and complete bounties using USDC payments.

apps.name: CICADA Finance
apps.description: Asset management platform combining RWA and DeFi yield.

apps.name: Humans of NS
apps.description: Photography project documenting and sharing stories from Network School community members.

apps.name: Network Graph Visualization Tool
apps.description: Application for analyzing and visualizing network connections using Farcaster usernames and social graphs.

apps.name: Blueprint E-Commerce Platform
apps.description: Online ordering system for Blueprint health products with warehouse expansion to Malaysia and Singapore.
